OOC: I'm not exactly sure where Aerotaur is but I hope this is close enough.  
If these shields are beyond the rules let me know.

::Aerotaur::
    He walks up to where Angel Prime, Windlord, and Grounded are.  "Hello.  I 
hope you're considering joining us.  Both of you.  Although it may be a bit 
dull for you Angel Prime.  We don't get many attacks way out here.  And we 
aren't equipped to attack anyone.  But we could really use the help.  We need 
to get some shields on this base."

::Obfucious::
    Still standing outside the base, "Sirs I've been thinking about this 
problem.  I think I can develop a different type of shielding for the base.  
It wouldn't be the best but it might work.  First we'd need typical force 
type shielding for use against missiles, lasers, etceteras.  Second a type of 
back up shielding.  It wouldn't affect incoming attacks but it would affect 
the incoming attackers.  A typical shield system uses a bubble of force to 
stop attacks. But deflecting them takes energy and they can be brought down.  
I propose focusing energon in such a way that it creates a bubble of an 
energon field around the base.  This would prevent bots from getting through. 
 Unfortunately the instability would mean we couldn't get out while they're 
up.  We would have to attack from well within the bubble to prevent stasis 
lock.  Our shots will still be able to pass through the shielding but theirs 
would not.  And the energon shields would last until the energon power source 
ran out.  It wouldn't last more than a day or two but that would be enough to 
repair and get back to battle."

    "Next for weapon systems we'll need automated turrets.  Mounted in the 
mountain side and around the base.  I'd also like a mine field but that 
wouldn't be necessary.  Maybe some more primitive traps, like the hole we're 
one step to the right of, or the logs.  They're primitive but effective."

    "The shielding I can modify and repair from spare parts in the base but I 
don't think I can make turrets from anything in there.  I'll need at least 
one example and some spare parts to build more with."

::Aerotaur::
    "I think it's time we visit the Maximals again Windlord.  They owe us a 
favor or two."
